E000-0000:
Fixing unit startup defect
 The detected temperature of the main thermistor does not rise after the heater is energised.
Main thermistor broken wire, fixer heater broken wire, DC controller PCB defect.
• Check the connector of the fixing unit, DC controller PCB, fixing power supply unit. • Replace the fixing film unit. • Replace the fixing power supply unit. • Replace the DC controller PCB.

Abnormally high temperature in fixing unit.
 The detected temperature of the main thermistor is abnormally high.
Main thermistor defect, DC controller PCB defect.
• Check the connector of the fixing unit, DC controller PCB, fixing power supply unit. • Replace the fixing film unit. • Replace the fixing power supply unit. • Replace the DC controller PCB.

Abnormally low temperature in fixing unit.
 The detected temperature of the main thermistor becomes lower than the specified one.
Fixing power supply unit defect, main thermistor broken wire, DC controller PCB defect
• Check the connector of the fixing unit, DC controller PCB, fixing power supply unit. • Replace the fixing film unit. • Replace the fixing power supply unit. • Replace the DC controller PCB.

Abnormality in fixing unit power supply drive circuitry.
 Zero cross signal could not be detected within specified time limit.
Fixing control circuitry defect.
• Check the connector of the fixing power supply unit, DC controller PCB, fixing power supply unit. • Replace the low-voltage power supply PCB.

Motor startup abnormality.
 ITB motor speed detection signal frequency does not reach specified frequency after starting to drive the ITB motor.
ITB motor defect, DC controller PCB defect
• Check the connector of the ITB motor, DC controller PCB. • Replace ITB motor. • Replace DC controller PCB.

Motor startup abnormality
 ITB motor speed detection signal frequency reaches the specified frequency but is then out of synch after 2 sec. or longer of operation.
ITB motor defect, DC controller PCB defect
• Check the connector of the ITB motor, DC controller PCB. • Replace ITB motor. • Replace DC controller PCB.

Developing roller release operation defect
 After the specified time from rotating the main motor for the developing roller depress/release, the output of the developing home position sensor does not change.
Developing home position sensor defect, Main motor defect, DC controller PCB defect
• Check the connector of the developer home position sensor, main motor, DC controller PCB • Replace the developer home position sensor • Replace the main motor • Replace the DC controller PCB

Density sensor abnormality
 Not enough light received upon image density detection.
Soiled density detection sensor, density detection sensor defect, DC controller PCB defect, toner cartridge defect
• Check the connector of the DC controller PCB. • Replace ITB unit • Replace DC controller PCB • Replace toner cartridge

Environment sensor abnormality
 Environment sensor abnormality
Environment sensor defect, DC controller PCB defect
• Check the connector of the environment sensor, DC controller PCB. • Replace environment sensor • Replace DC controller PCB

ITB/TOP sensor failed
 ITB/TOP sensor failed.
ITB/TOP sensor defect, DC controller PCB defect
• Check the connector of the ITB unit, DC controller PCB. • Replace ITB unit • Replace DC controller PCB

Scanner unit, laser unit, BD abnormality.
 Yellow optical assembly failure.
Laser scanner defect, DC controller PCB defect
• Check the connector of the laser scanner unit, DC controller PCB. • Replace laser scanner unit • Replace DC controller PCB

• Check the connector of the laser scanner unit, DC controller PCB. • Replace laser scanner unit • Replace DC controller PCB

• Check the connector of the laser scanner unit, DC controller PCB. • Replace laser scanner unit • Replace DC controller PCB

Scanner unit, laser unit, BD abnormality.
 Black optical assembly failure.
Laser scanner defect, DC controller PCB defect
• Check the connector of the laser scanner unit, DC controller PCB. • Replace laser scanner unit • Replace DC controller PCB

BD correction control failure
 The machine does not change to the scanner ready status, after starting BD control.
Laser scanner unit defect, DC controller PCB defect
• Replace the laser scanner unit • Replace DC controller PCB

 DC controller PCB ROM update failed.
• Replace DC controller PCB • Replace Main controller PCB

Wireless LAN module communication error

Fan Motor 1 failure
 The Fan Motor 1 (power supply) cannot rotate at the specified revolution.
• Replace Fan Motor • Replace Drive PCB

Release mechanism abnormality.
 Mechanism does not reach home position (engaged) after home position control begins.
Fixing drive assembly defect, fixing release cam defect
• Replace fixing drive assembly • Replace fixing release cam
